title: BRIEF-Saia - ‍ In Jan 2018, Ltl Shipments/Workday Increased 8.9 Percent
text: March 2, 2018 / 12:39 PM / in 4 minutes BRIEF-Saia - ‍ In Jan 2018, Ltl Shipments/Workday Increased 8.9 Percent Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 2 (Reuters) - Saia Inc: * SAIA - ‍ IN JAN 2018, LTL SHIPMENTS/WORKDAY INCREASED 8.9 PERCENT, LTL TONNAGE/WORKDAY INCREASED 11.1 PERCENT VERSUS JAN 2017​ * SAIA INC - ‍ IN FEB 2018, LTL SHIPMENTS/WORKDAY INCREASED 10.6 PERCENT, LTL TONNAGE/WORKDAY INCREASED 13.2 PERCENT VERSUS FEB 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
